name: Catch the Play
description:
A daring adventure? A heart-breaking affair? A ghastly drama? The theater holds many stories to share! What will this play bring to the ever waiting audience tonight? Don't miss this enthralling show and catch the play!

Instructions: Left and Right Arrow Keys/ A D to move left and right. Left click to shoot. Space bar to Jump.

Created for Trijam #50: Not The Game You Think It Was. All assets were self-created. Note: The project exceeded the three hour expectancy.
